m_szDocTitle: VERY HIGH FREQUENCY SWITCHING CELL-BASED POWER CONVERTER - ONCHIP POWER
m_szDocSumamry: VERY HIGH FREQUENCY SWITCHING CELL-BASED POWER CONVERTER WIPO Patent Application WO/2012/024542 A2 Abstract: In an aspect, the present invention provides a high frequency switching power converter. The high frequency switching power converter may include a plurality of soft- switchable power cells flexibly connected to receive an input signal in series and provide an output. The high frequency switching power converter may further include a controller for configuring the flexible connection and for controlling the power cells to receive the input signal.
